en.title: FE Making Inroads in Bangladesh!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR ALAN YEO.

On 11th July 2009, Presidential Directors Tily Kong,  Alan Yeo & FE Leader Jack Lee went to Dhaka, Bangladesh to assist their downline Stockist Mr Mah Mazumder Salim. Three BEPs were conducted at Mr Salim's FE Dhaka Service Center during the visit.The response was very good. Many were amazed at the power of FE's Quantum Pendant. Later a training workshop was conducted for the leaders there. They were quick to pick up all the key points shared by PD Alan Yeo & FE Leader Jack Lee and were excited to bring the simple but powerful & successfully proven FE Worldwide Business and the amazing Quantum Pendant to the Dhaka market.

On the final day,PD Alan Yeo performed a QP demo on Mr Syed Moazzam Hossain, the Managing Director of SMH Engineering Limited, who is also a Director of The Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry (DCCI). Mr Syed was amazed at the power of the Quantum Pendant & bought a set too.

It was a successful trip. The team is confident that the FE Dhaka Service Center will be able churn up many more stockists within that region very soon!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
